website_summaries.verdict: A versatile sectional that allows you to mix and match the arrangement of the seats. Comes at an affordable price.
pros: Includes one right arm chair, one left arm chair, one corner chair, and two armless chairs for maximum customization
Comes with firm yet comfortable plush cushions
cons: The hardwood frame juts out a bit between sections, making it uncomfortable to stretch out on

customer_reviews.title: Fair for the cost
customer_reviews.text: The cushions for the couch were nice and comfortable. The color is exactly as pictured. It was very easy to assemble. The size of the couch seats are fairly small. It is not a couch that a person can comfortably lounge on or sleep on due to the seat size. The couch is also not very durable. The arm rest has cracked and the seat cushions have lost shape working 9 months of purchasing. Considering the cost of the couch, it was a fair deal, however, I would go for a higher quality option if I had the money to spend again
customer_reviews.author: David A. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Be weary of the high star reviews - not what it seems
customer_reviews.text: We bought this couch because of the reviews that said it was good for a small space and very comfortable. We just unpacked and assembled everything and I am a little disappointed. The assembly did not take very long at all but you can tell from the start that the construction is flimsy and it is not going to last a long time. It is small, which is a plus, but I cannot vouch for the confines. Hopefully it will break in. Ugh, so sad. I wish I had paid attention to the more negative reviews. We will see how it holds up, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jane966

customer_reviews.title: Good basic couch but starts to get worn down pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this couch, and it was fairly straightforward to put together, however just as a few others have said it becomes worn very quickly after just 6 months of use, and it is no longer as comfortable to lounge on. Since the cushions are attached to the frame and there are no zippers, you also can't restuff the cushions. Its a good basic couch but you won't get a lot of mileage out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nissa Romanowski

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this couch. Easy to assemble. I did it by myself. The only thing is sometimes the hooks of the couches become unconnected, if that makes sense. Also- would like just one more middle section chair to extend it. Great quality and comfortable- have owned it for a few weeks now and still satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light grey has bluish tint
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch. Came in 4 boxes. Each box was not too heavy so I was able to get into my apartment on my own (I’m not very strong). Assembly was easy and quick. Love that you can arrange the pieces however you want. Only thing is I wish the pieces that keep it together kept it from sliding back (see video) I got the light grey which had a bluish tint which I was not expecting. But I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: ltpanda

customer_reviews.title: Great couch for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this couch. I live in a second story apartment with a small door and a pretty small living room. In order to fit a couch through my apartment and front door, I looked at modular sofas. Other places offer modular sofas starting around $1000 for a five-piece set. This one was nearly half the price, delivered to my door in 2-5 days, easy to set up, and it fits perfectly in my space. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For the price, great. Arrived in 4 large boxes, easy to assemble and everything fit together. The cushions are firm, but I like firm furniture. The brackets holding the sections together aren't super sturdy, you may want to invest in small clamps to hold the wood on the bottom of the sections together.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: Color is more of a grey blue.. cool tone. Not as pictured. Seat is very hard( firm) and back cushion is soft. I like look but pieces move around too and shift when you sit on couch. Overall disappointed with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Franklin

customer_reviews.title: great couch for the price!
customer_reviews.text: very nice couch for the price, easy to put together, comfortable, shipped on time, spacious and looks very nice. there is something minor if you have hardwood floor but its fixable. some sections might slide apart but you can buy rubber pad so they wont move!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small corner sofa with arms and this turned out so cute! Plus I have two extra armless pieces to use in another room. My pieces came in three separate deliveries. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: which I like. I am 6’4” and find it perfectly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece of furnature . Seats are a little firm , which I like . I am 6’4” and find it perfectly comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: pretty easy to put together. Best with two people and need to be strong. The clasps that hold the sections together pop out very easily which is annoying. It is comfortable, true color from photos.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Small and perfect for our space
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Small and perfect for our space. Color is a light grey, almost blue, but we love it! Cushions somewhat firm, however that is how we prefer this couch to be. Can easily seat 4-5 adults with a few kids in between. Great buy, love the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Width is pretty small. Wonderful couch other than that!! Easy assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seat back don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: The seatbacks did not fit into the couch! Uncomfortable too. I liked the color its a light grey/blue.
customer_reviews.author: barbara mc

customer_reviews.title: A compact sectional sofa
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble. Works exactly as advertised. This is pretty much the only item of its size. A "very small sectional sofa".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: One of the best in customer service. Its a great small couch. Its versatile and the color is great. There customer service is unbeatable. I would definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Busscher Koert

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home Carolina Tufted Fabric Sectional Sofa | in Light Grey
product_meta.description: This sectional couch is a great addition for you living room. Mix and match the included seats to create whatever shape works best for your space. This sectional features soft fabric and extra plush cushions, to give you the best experience while relaxing in your own home. All of your friends and family will be asking you where you got such a stylish, comfortable couch so they can get one all their own
feature_bullets: Includes: One (1) Right Arm Chair, One (1) Left Arm Chair, One (1) Corner Chair, and Two (2) Armless Chairs
Material: Fabric | Fabric Composition: 100% Polyester | Leg Material: Birch | Color: Light Grey | Leg Finish: Dark Brown

Left and Right Armed Chair Dimensions: 33.00 inches deep x 27.50 inches wide x 35.50 inches high | Corner Chair Dimensions: 33.00 inches deep x 33.00 inches wide x 35.50 inches high | Seat Width: 18.00 inches | Seat Depth: 18.00 inches | Seat Height: 19.50 inches| Armless Chair Dimensions: 33.00 inches deep x 24.50 inches wide x 35.50 inches high | Seat Width: 24.00 inches | Seat Depth: 20.00 inches | Seat Height: 19.50 inches

This sectional features soft fabric and extra plush cushions, to give you the best experience while relaxing in your own home.
